headlines.description: — Nikola Vucevic took advantage of Indiana's missing big men by posting 32 points and 17 rebounds to help the Chicago Bulls overwhelm the short-handed Pacers 113-97 Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vucevic helps Bulls run past short-handed Pacers 113-97

events.name: New Orleans Pelicans at Atlanta Hawks

headlines.description: — Trae Young scored 30 points and helped lead a third-quarter 3-point barrage as the surging Atlanta Hawks beat Zion Williamson and the New Orleans Pelicans 123-107 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Trae Young leads hot-shooting Hawks past Pelicans, 123-107

headlines.description: — Joel Embiid scored 35 points and the Philadelphia 76ers rolled to a 106-96 win over the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Embiid scores 35, 76ers dominate Celtics in 106-96 win

events.name: Los Angeles Lakers at Toronto Raptors

headlines.description: — The Los Angeles Lakers built a 34-point lead in the first 20 minutes and cruised to a 110-101 win over the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lakers build big early lead, cruise past Raptors 110-101

headlines.description: — Dillon Brooks scored 28 points on 10-for-16 shooting and the Memphis Grizzlies ended another Miami winning streak, beating the Heat 124-112 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brooks, Grizzlies end another Heat win streak, 124-112

headlines.description: — Nikola Jokic scored 27 points in 27 minutes and the Denver Nuggets spoiled the return of Jerami Grant and Mason Plumlee with a 134-119 shellacking of the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nikola Jokic's 27 points leads Nuggets past Pistons 134-119

events.name: Milwaukee Bucks at Golden State Warriors

headlines.description: — Kelly Oubre Jr. converted a pair of free throws with 7.7 seconds left to give Golden State the lead, and Milwaukee missed at the end as the Warriors held off the Bucks 122-121 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Curry, Warriors use furious finish to hold off Bucks 122-121

events.name: Portland Trail Blazers at LA Clippers

headlines.description: — Paul George scored 36 points and the Los Angeles Clippers rode a franchise-best 47-point first quarter to a 133-116 victory over the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: George scores 36, Clippers rout Trail Blazers 133-116
